answers.answer: Possibly the dizziness is due to fluid accumulating in your ears from sinus drainage.  This is what I experience at times. Found exercises, Brandt-Daroff, that are helpful.  Basicily I lay on the bed so that my neck is on the edge of the bed. Then turn my head to the left 3xs and then to the right 3xs. You may be able to find the exercises on You tube.

question: For about 3 yrs I have been dizzy and had sinus pressure and headaches could the dizzines be from allergies i am taking claritan and using nasonex but they dont seem to work i also have diabetes but that is under control do you recommened anything that would help with the dizziness
title: allergies
